TITLE: Episode 102 - Just Say NO to the Metaverse
DESCRIPTION: We all need friends in these dark and strange times, so we felt incredibly lucky to be joined once again by our friends, Monica Perez and Brad Binkley of The Propaganda Report. We played catch up, learning about the Metaverse, discussing Germ Theory, and speaking to the need for us to all keep our cool as things get weirder and weirder.
CONTENT: We all need friends in these dark and strange times, so we felt incredibly lucky to be joined once again by our friends, [Monica Perez](https://twitter.com/MonicaPerezShow) and [Brad Binkley](https://twitter.com/freedomactradio) of [The Propaganda Report](https://www.thepropreport.com). We played catch up, learning about the Metaverse, discussing Germ Theory, and speaking to the need for us to all keep our cool as things get weirder and weirder.
